txt.en: 'These injuries make it difficult to ride a horse; I made it the rest of the way only through the careful guidance and measured gait of my steed, and could not hope to fight at the end of the journey. This makes me merely a burden on the ride to Gondor, but a tremendous weakness in the line upon our arrival. My presence would harm the King more than my absence.\n\n'My body will heal, in time, but it is my mind that will hurt longest, if I cannot fight for my King when he goes forth to Gondor.'
Are you going to be all right?
